attributes.action: make it illegal for ANY wheeled items (apart from prams and pushchairs; and wheelchairs) to be on pavements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This refers to such things as scooters, "heelies", roller skates, skate-boards or any other means of getting around which can be hazardous to those using the pavements to WALK on; especially anyone who would have difficulty getting out of the way.  Such things can cause accidents; pavements are not playgrounds and scooters, etc, should be ridden only in parks or similar areas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
